headline: Are Your Mega-High Stock Dividends Safe?
summary: Tracey Ryniec, Zacks Senior Stock Strategist, and Bryan Hayes, editor of Zacks Income Investor newsletter, discuss 5 popular stocks with high dividend yields. Can the dividend be trusted?

headline: BP takeover reports, Grindr dips on revenue, Trade Desk soars
summary: Yahoo Finance host Madison Mills tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including a report of BP (BP) rivals planning a possible takeover, dating app Grindr (GRND) missed first quarter revenue estimates, and Trade Desk (TTD) shares soaring on its first quarter results and outlook. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Chevron Corporation (CVX): Among the Undervalued Dividend Aristocrats to Buy Now
summary: We recently published a list of the 11 Undervalued Dividend Aristocrats to Buy Now.
